statements: SELECT * FROM data_trends_quality_issues;
SELECT id, issue_description, detected_at FROM data_trends_quality_issues WHERE severity='High';
SELECT * FROM data_trends_quality_issues WHERE severity='Low' ORDER BY detected_at DESC;
SELECT id, issue_description, affected_product FROM data_trends_quality_issues WHERE detected_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT severity, COUNT(*) AS issue_count FROM data_trends_quality_issues GROUP BY severity ORDER BY issue_count DESC;
SELECT id, issue_description, detected_at, severity, affected_product FROM data_trends_quality_issues WHERE severity = 'High' ORDER BY detected_at DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM data_trends_quality_issues WHERE issue_description LIKE '%bug%' ORDER BY detected_at ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT id, issue_description, detected_at, severity FROM data_trends_quality_issues WHERE affected_product = 'Product A' AND severity = 'Medium'
SELECT id, issue_description, detected_at, affected_product FROM data_trends_quality_issues WHERE detected_at > '2022-01-01' AND detected_at < '2022-03-01' ORDER BY detected_at DESC
SELECT id, issue_description, detected_at, severity FROM data_trends_quality_issues WHERE severity IN ('High', 'Low') ORDER BY severity DESC, detected_at ASC LIMIT 3
SELECT * FROM data_trends_analysis;
SELECT item_name, data_value FROM data_trends_analysis WHERE id = 1;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM data_trends_analysis;
SELECT * FROM quality_issues WHERE severity = 'high';
SELECT issue_id, description FROM quality_issues ORDER BY issue_id DESC;
SELECT id, item_name, data_value, data_date FROM data_trends_analysis WHERE data_value > 100 ORDER BY data_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM quality_issues WHERE severity = 'high' AND resolved = FALSE;
SELECT item_name, AVG(data_value) AS avg_value FROM data_trends_analysis GROUP BY item_name HAVING avg_value > 50 ORDER BY avg_value ASC;
SELECT item_name, COUNT(*) AS num_issues FROM data_trends_analysis JOIN quality_issues ON data_trends_analysis.id = quality_issues.issue_id GROUP BY item_name ORDER BY num_issues DESC;
SELECT data_date, COUNT(*) AS num_records FROM data_trends_analysis GROUP BY data_date HAVING num_records > 3 ORDER BY data_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM quality_checks;
SELECT product_name, production_date FROM products ORDER BY production_date DESC;
SELECT issue_id, product_id, issue_description FROM issues WHERE resolved = FALSE;
SELECT product_name, production_date, quality_status FROM products WHERE quality_status = 'good';
SELECT product_name, production_date, quality_status FROM products WHERE production_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY production_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM quality_checks WHERE check_result = 'Passed';
SELECT product_id, product_name, production_date FROM products WHERE quality_status = 'Good' ORDER BY production_date DESC;
SELECT issue_description FROM issues WHERE resolved = FALSE ORDER BY issue_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT qc.check_id, qc.product_id, qc.check_date, p.product_name FROM quality_checks qc JOIN products p ON qc.product_id = p.product_id WHERE qc.check_result = 'Failed';

SELECT p.product_name, COUNT(qc.check_id) AS total_checks FROM products p LEFT JOIN quality_checks qc ON p.product_id = qc.product_id GROUP BY p.product_name HAVING total_checks > 10 ORDER BY total_checks DESC;
SELECT * FROM quality_issues;
SELECT id, category, description FROM quality_issues WHERE category = 'defect';
SELECT id, trend FROM trend_analysis WHERE analysis_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, source_name FROM data_sources WHERE data_type = 'database';
SELECT id, commenter, comment_text FROM issue_comments WHERE commenter LIKE '%John%';
SELECT * FROM quality_issues WHERE category = 'Defect' ORDER BY detection_date DESC;
SELECT trend, analysis_date FROM trend_analysis WHERE analysis_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT issue_id, source_name, data_type FROM trend_analysis JOIN data_sources ON trend_analysis.id = data_sources.id WHERE data_type = 'CSV' ORDER BY issue_id DESC;
SELECT description, category, detection_date FROM quality_issues LEFT JOIN issue_comments ON quality_issues.id = issue_comments.issue_id WHERE commenter = 'John Doe';
SELECT issue_id, comment_text FROM issue_comments WHERE comment_text LIKE '%resolved%';
SELECT * FROM DataTrendAnalysis ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, value FROM DataTrendAnalysis WHERE value > 100;
SELECT * FROM QualityIssues WHERE severity = 'High';
SELECT source_name, sensor_type FROM DataSources WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature';
SELECT log_id, resolved FROM IssueLogs WHERE resolved = FALSE;
SELECT * FROM DataTrendAnalysis WHERE value > 100 ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT issue_id, issue_description FROM QualityIssues WHERE severity = 'High'
SELECT source_name, sensor_type FROM DataSources WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature'
SELECT pattern_description FROM TrendPatterns WHERE category = 'Anomalies' ORDER BY pattern_id ASC
SELECT * FROM IssueLogs WHERE resolved = FALSE
